markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Biloko Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1427)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Bilokos prefer to move in small, stealthy packs through dark, isolated sections of the forest. When a band of bilokos finds a suitable hunting ground, they claim the area exclusively, digging pit traps, crafting snares from vines, and building blinds high in trees where they can lie in ambush.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Biloko Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1427)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 294 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +7; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** -1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2) (Hardness 3, HP 12, BT 6)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 (18 with shield raised)

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 19

**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +7,
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +7,
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +6 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 14
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

**Inspired Feast**  ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) If a biloko feasts on a [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6) corpse for 1 minute or more, they gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 hour.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-108" />
name: Biloko Warrior
